songs.title: Ode to Joy
songs.description: Beethoven's iconic melody arranged for 4-channel NES chiptune with full harmony and percussion

songs.title: Für Elise
songs.description: Beethoven's delicate piano piece reimagined with pulse waves and arpeggiated accompaniment

songs.title: Greensleeves
songs.description: Medieval English folk song with pulse25 lead and waltz-like bass patterns

songs.title: Canon in D
songs.description: Pachelbel's famous canon with layered entry of voices over the iconic bass progression

songs.title: Megabyte Menace
songs.description: Intense D minor boss battle theme with fast arpeggios, chromatic tension, and driving percussion

songs.title: Midnight Rain
songs.description: Moody lo-fi chiptune in C minor with lowpass-filtered instruments and sparse rain textures

songs.title: Crystal Caves
songs.description: Dreamy ambient piece with sine pads, crystalline arpeggios, and water drip effects

songs.title: Neon Highway
songs.description: Driving synthwave-influenced track with detuned sawtooth leads and four-on-the-floor beats

songs.title: Glitch Dimension
songs.description: 3-minute experimental epic — sparse glitch intro builds through tritone grooves into an ambient cathedral breakdown, erupts in a Beautiful Accident climax with screaming diminished arpeggios, then dissolves into digital fragments

songs.title: Ocarina Echoes
songs.description: Adventure-game inspired forest theme with flute-like lead, rain bridge, and looping overworld energy

songs.title: Cathedral Vigil
songs.description: Long-form gothic cathedral background loop with organ reeds, bell mixtures, and slow procession motifs

songs.title: Requiem in Stone
songs.description: Through-composed gothic tone poem in E Phrygian — solo Bach counterpoint dissolves into Debussy parallel harmonies, erupts into a Beethoven rhythmic storm, then fades to silence with a Picardy third

songs.title: Sonata in C (Dissolving)
songs.description: Classical Mozart sonata that gradually dissolves — pristine Alberti bass and period phrases melt into whole-tone scales, chromatic chaos, and ghostly detuned fragments

songs.title: Tavern Brawl Crescendo
songs.description: Dignified tavern waltz escalates into full bar-fight chaos with chromatic mayhem, then settles into a sheepish off-key reprise

songs.title: Abyssal Waltz
songs.description: Submarine sonar pings evolve into a melancholy deep-sea waltz with bioluminescent arpeggios and whale-like bass

songs.title: Recursive Disagreement
songs.description: Two AI voices argue in counterpoint — polite call-and-response escalates to chromatic shouting, brief unison agreement, then immediate relapse into chaos

songs.title: Graceful Defeat
songs.description: Bittersweet victory fanfare for losing gracefully — Mixolydian/Dorian brass march with a brief flash of what triumph would have felt like

songs.title: Caravan of the Sirocco
songs.description: Desert caravan in E Phrygian with Andalusian cadences and oud ornaments — a sandstorm engulfs the melody before the theme emerges triumphant

songs.title: Speedrun Any%
songs.description: An entire RPG compressed into one track — title screen, town, overworld, dungeon, boss battle, victory, and credits connected by one transforming 4-note motif

songs.title: Orbital Lounge
songs.description: Smoky jazz club floating in orbit — walking bass, ii-V-I progressions, and whole-tone weightless passages fade to an intimate 2am set

songs.title: Cradle of the Colossus
songs.description: A gentle music-box lullaby that secretly contains an aggressive boss theme in augmentation — the true nature briefly reveals itself before settling back to sleep

songs.title: Save Corrupted (Recovering...)
songs.description: A corrupted save file slowly repairs itself — chaotic data fragments gradually reassemble into a beautiful melody before glitches creep back and the file cuts off

songs.title: Bonus Stage Bounce
songs.description: Bouncy 8-bit bonus stage theme with a funky E minor groove, syncopated bass, and a suspiciously familiar melody woven throughout

songs.title: White Pony ROM
songs.description: Deftones-inspired 8-bit shoegaze — ethereal sine vocals drift over detuned sawtooth guitar walls and heavy triangle bass in Bb minor, with quiet-loud-quiet dynamics and a dreamy underwater bridge
